tswitem.name: Signet of Healer's Zeal
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Healer's Zeal
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you directly heal an ally who is below 50% health, you have a 10%/20%/30% chance to gain a resource for both weapons. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans or Weapons. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
